## EDA- dataset was taken from here <https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/junsoopablo/korean-genome-and-epidemiology-study-koges?select=follow_02_data.csv>

```{r}
dataset <- read.csv('follow_02_data.csv')
```

```{r}
# Define the new column names
ncol(dataset)
new_colnames <- c("Personal_ID", "Unit_Data_Class", "Survey_Date", "Age", "Marital_Status", 
  "Alcohol_Drinking_Status", "Total_Drinking_Frequency", "Total_Drinking_Amount", 
  "Rice_Wine_Drinking_Frequency", "Rice_Wine_Drinking_Amount", "Wine_Drinking_Frequency", 
  "Wine_Drinking_Amount", "Soju_Drinking_Frequency", "Soju_Drinking_Amount", 
  "Beer_Drinking_Frequency", "Beer_Drinking_Amount", "High_Liquor_Drinking_Frequency", 
  "High_Liquor_Drinking_Amount", "Smoking_Status", "Smoking_Duration", 
  "Smoking_Amount_Per_Day", "Passive_Smoking_Exposure", "Exercise_Frequency", 
  "Hypertension_Diagnosis", "Age_Diagnosed_Hypertension", "Diabetes_Diagnosis", 
  "Age_Diagnosed_Diabetes", "Hyperlipidemia_Diagnosis", "Age_Diagnosed_Hyperlipidemia", 
  "Family_History_Hypertension_Father", "Age_Father_Diagnosed_Hypertension", 
  "Family_History_Hypertension_Mother", "Age_Mother_Diagnosed_Hypertension", 
  "Family_History_Diabetes_Father", "Age_Father_Diagnosed_Diabetes", 
  "Family_History_Diabetes_Mother", "Age_Mother_Diagnosed_Diabetes", 
  "Pregnancy_Experience", "Age_First_Pregnancy", "Height_cm", "Weight_kg", 
  "Waist_Circumference_cm", "Hip_Circumference_cm", "Pulse_Rate", 
  "Systolic_Blood_Pressure", "Diastolic_Blood_Pressure", "HbA1C", 
  "Fasting_Glucose", "Creatinine_Level", "AST", "ALT", "Total_Cholesterol", 
  "HDL_Cholesterol", "Triglycerides", "Fasting_Insulin")

# Rename columns in the dataset
colnames(dataset) <- new_colnames

```

```{r}
#[Code 66666: Not surveyed; 77777: Not applicable; 99999: Unknown/Not answered/Not measured]
head(dataset)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggcorrplot)

subset_dataset <- dataset[c("Diabetes_Diagnosis", "Weight_kg", 
                            "Total_Cholesterol", "HbA1C", 
                            "Fasting_Glucose", "Creatinine_Level")]

corr <- round(cor(subset_dataset), 1)
ggcorrplot(corr,hc.order = TRUE,
type = "lower",
outline.color = "white",
ggtheme = ggplot2::theme_void(),
colors = c("#6D9EC1", "white", "#E46726"),
lab = TRUE)
```
